templates.name: updateTaskICMore
templates.content:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:wsse="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/07/secext" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:act="urn:crmondemand/ws/ecbs/activity/" xmlns:data="urn:/crmondemand/xml/Activity/Data">
   <soapenv:Header>
    	<wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1">
    		<wsse:UsernameToken>
                <wsse:Username>${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMoreUsername}</wsse:Username>
                <wsse:Password Type="wsse:PasswordText">${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMorePassword}</wsse:Password>
            </wsse:UsernameToken>
    	</wsse:Security>
    </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <act:ActivityUpdate_Input>
         <data:ListOfActivity lastpage="?" recordcount="?">
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <data:Activity operation="?">
                <#list body.variables?keys as variableName>
                    <#if variableName?starts_with("SET_")>
                        <#assign tagName = variableName?split("_")[1]>
                        <data:${tagName}>${body.variables[variableName]}</data:${tagName}>
                    </#if>
                </#list>
            </data:Activity>
         </data:ListOfActivity>
      </act:ActivityUpdate_Input>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

templates.name: retrieveBIinfoGroupConsolidation_setVariables
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#if body?is_hash && body.errorOccured??>
    <@printObjectToJson source=body />
<#else>
    <#if body?? && body?is_hash && body.description?? && body.description.title??>
        <#if body.description.title == "No results were found">
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "NoBIResultsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#elseif body.description.title == "More than one record was found">
           {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "MultipleRecordsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#else>
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "RetrieveBIError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }										  
          }
        </#if>
    <#else>
            {
                "status": "true",
                "processVariables": {
                    "borrowerGroupConsolidatedCreditLine": "${body.GCCalculationFunction.BorrowerGroupConsolidatedCreditLine!}",
                    "companyConsolidatedCreditLine": "${body.GCCalculationFunction.CompanyConsolidatedCreditlLineCalculation!}"
                }
            }
    </#if>
</#if>

storeFileToDMS
templates.content:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://schemas.dfs.com/automotive/document/archival/1.0">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ns:ArchiveDocument>
         <ns:Customer>
            <ns:bp_number></ns:bp_number>
		    <ns:enterpriseno>${body.variables.CompanyIdentifier!}</ns:enterpriseno>
		    <ns:vatno>${body.variables.VatId!}</ns:vatno>
		    <ns:referenceno>${body.variables.CompanyIdentifier!}</ns:referenceno>
		    <ns:bpcode></ns:bpcode>
		    <ns:partnercustomerno></ns:partnercustomerno>
		    <#if body.variables.AccountName?? && body.variables.AccountName?has_content && body.variables.AccountName?is_string && (body.variables.AccountName?length > 30)>
		        <ns:searchname>${body.variables.AccountName[0..29]!}</ns:searchname>
		    <#else>
		        <ns:searchname>${body.variables.AccountName!}</ns:searchname>
		    </#if>
		    <#if body.variables.CustomerName?? && body.variables.CustomerName?has_content && body.variables.CustomerName?is_string && (body.variables.CustomerName?length > 30)>
		        <ns:billingname>${body.variables.CustomerName[0..29]!}</ns:billingname>
		    <#else>
		        <ns:billingname>${body.variables.CustomerName!}</ns:billingname>
		    </#if>    
         </ns:Customer>
         <ns:Basic_Attributes>
            <ns:country>${body.variables.CustomerCountry!}</ns:country>
            <#if body.variables.LessorID == "NLMBL">
                <ns:legal_entity>MBFSNL</ns:legal_entity>
            <#elseif body.variables.LessorID == "NLSLS">
                <ns:legal_entity>SpecialLease</ns:legal_entity>
            <#elseif body.variables.LessorID == "BEPRL">
                <ns:legal_entity>PremiumLease</ns:legal_entity>
            <#elseif body.variables.LessorID == "FRMFL">
                <ns:legal_entity>MobiFleet</ns:legal_entity>
            <#elseif body.variables.LessorID == "FRUCAR">
                <ns:legal_entity>UCAR</ns:legal_entity>
            <#else>
                <ns:legal_entity>Athlon${body.variables.CustomerCountry!}</ns:legal_entity>
            </#if>
            <ns:segment>Core</ns:segment>
            <ns:status>ACTIVE</ns:status>
            <ns:statusdate></ns:statusdate>
            <ns:workspacetype></ns:workspacetype>
            <ns:workspacetemplate></ns:workspacetemplate>
         </ns:Basic_Attributes>
         <ns:Contract>
            <ns:contractid></ns:contractid>
            <ns:contracttype></ns:contracttype>
            <ns:segment>Core</ns:segment>
            <ns:contractstartdate></ns:contractstartdate>
            <ns:contractenddate></ns:contractenddate>
            <ns:vehicleid></ns:vehicleid>
         </ns:Contract>
         <ns:Case>
            <ns:caseid>${body.variables.ApplicationId!}</ns:caseid>
            <ns:casetype>CRA</ns:casetype>
            <ns:casedate>${body.variables.ApplicationEntryDate[0..9]!}</ns:casedate>
         </ns:Case>
         <ns:Document_Basic_Attributes>
            <ns:doc_type_number>${body.documentRestrictionCode!}</ns:doc_type_number>
            <ns:doc_type_name></ns:doc_type_name>
            <ns:segment>Core</ns:segment>
            <ns:adate></ns:adate>
            <ns:notificationto></ns:notificationto>
            <ns:uniqueidentifier></ns:uniqueidentifier>
         </ns:Document_Basic_Attributes>
         <ns:Document>
            <#if body.fileName?? && body.fileName?has_content && (body.fileName?length > 60)>
                <ns:DocumentName>${body.fileName?keep_before_last(".")[0..56]}.${body.fileName?keep_after_last(".")}</ns:DocumentName>
            <#else>
                <ns:DocumentName>${body.fileName}</ns:DocumentName>
            </#if>
            <ns:MimeType>${determineMimeType(body.fileName)}</ns:MimeType>
            <ns:DocumentContent>${body.fileData!}</ns:DocumentContent>
    </ns:Document>
      </ns:ArchiveDocument>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

templates.name: addNote

<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
{
    "modifications": {
        <#if body.processVariables.opinionNumber??>
            "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.message_text.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\",\"label\":\"Second opinion (${body.processVariables.opinionNumber.value?json_string})\"}",
                "type": "json"
            }
        <#else>
            "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.message_text.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\"}",
                "type": "json"
            }
        </#if>
    }
}

<#if body?? && body.bpmnError?? && body.bpmnError.bpmnErrorCode?? && body.bpmnError.bpmnErrorCode == "HitListReceivedException">
    <#assign hitlistError = true>
<#elseif body?? && body.bpmnError?? && body.bpmnError.bpmnErrorCode?? && body.bpmnError.bpmnErrorCode == "RetrieveAutomaticCreditScoreError">
    <#assign cdsError = true>
</#if> 
{
    "pipes": [
        <#if hitlistError?? && hitlistError == true> 
        {
            "type" : "action",
            "name" : "setMultipleVariablesToProcess",
            "script": "headers.processInstanceId = body.processInstanceId; body.variablesToSet = [possibleCustomers: '<@printObjectToJsonString source=body.bpmnError.possibleCustomers />', CreditPlatformResponseJSON: '<@printObjectToJsonString source=body.CreditPlatformResponseJSON />']; body.types = [possibleCustomers: 'Json', CreditPlatformResponseJSON: 'Json'];"
        },
        <#elseif cdsError?? && cdsError == true>
        {
            "type" : "action",
            "name" : "setVariableToProcess",
            "script" : "headers.processInstanceId = body.processInstanceId; headers.variableName = 'CreditPlatformResponseJSON'; body.variableValue = body.CreditPlatformResponseJSON; body.variableType = 'Json'"
        },
        </#if>
        {
            "type": "transform",
            "name": "returnOriginalBody"
        }
    ]
}

templates.name: retrieveICMoreAccountData
templates.content:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:wsse="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/07/secext" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:acc="urn:crmondemand/ws/ecbs/account/" xmlns:quer="urn:/crmondemand/xml/Account/Query">
   <soapenv:Header>
      <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1">
         <wsse:UsernameToken>
            <wsse:Username>${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMoreUsername}</wsse:Username>
            <wsse:Password Type="wsse:PasswordText">${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMorePassword}</wsse:Password>
         </wsse:UsernameToken>
      </wsse:Security>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <acc:AccountQueryPage_Input>
         <quer:ListOfAccount pagesize="50" startrownum="0" recordcountneeded="true">
            <!--Optional:-->
            <quer:Account>
               <!--You may enter the following 1038 items in any order-->
               <quer:ModifiedDate/>
               <!--Account id-->
               <quer:Id>='${body.variables.EVENT_AccountId}'</quer:Id>
               <!--Athlon entitiy = Country-->
               <quer:IndexedPick0/>
               <!--Requested credit line-->
               <quer:CustomCurrency3/>
               <!--Current credit line-->
               <quer:CustomCurrency0/>
               <!--Company name-->
               <quer:AccountName/>
               <!--BillingName-->
               <quer:CustomText1/>
               <!--Address street-->
               <quer:PrimaryBillToStreetAddress/>
               <!--Address Postalcode-->
               <quer:PrimaryBillToPostalCode/>
               <!--Address Province code-->
               <quer:PrimaryBillToProvince/>
               <!--Address City-->
               <quer:PrimaryBillToCity/>
               <!--Request type-->
               <quer:CustomPickList65/>
               <!--Sales person-->
               <quer:Owner/>
               <!--Sales person full name-->
               <quer:OwnerFullName/>
               <!--Below are details that we will update in the process-->
               <!--Company identifier-->
               <quer:CustomText32/>
               <!--Customer number-->
               <quer:CustomText33/>
               <!--Siren/Siret/RCI number-->
               <quer:CustomText36/>
               <!--Company VAT number-->
               <quer:CustomText31/>
               <!--Camunda RFI description-->
               <quer:CustomText44/>
               <!--Original process instance id-->
               <!--Alias of person who started the assessment-->
               <quer:CustomText46/>
               <!--Credit line request status-->
               <quer:CustomPickList63/>
               <!--Credit line automatic decision-->
               <quer:CustomPickList67/>
               <!--Credit assessment URL-->
               <quer:CustomWebLink2/>
               <!--Credit assessment start date/time-->
               <quer:CustomDate3/>
               <!--Athlon entity-->
               <quer:IndexedPick0/>
               <!--Team identifier-->
               <quer:CustomPickList10/> 
            </quer:Account>
         </quer:ListOfAccount>
      </acc:AccountQueryPage_Input>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

}

templates.name: prepareUploads
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#assign timestamp = (aDateTime?long / 1000)?round?c>

{
    "variables": {
        <#list body.uploadFields as uploadField>
            <#if headers.filesInfo[uploadField]??>
                <#if headers.filesInfo[uploadField]?is_sequence>
                sequence
                <#else>
                    "DOCUMENT_${timestamp}_${headers.filesInfo[uploadField].filename}.${headers.filesInfo[uploadField].extension}": {
                        "fileName": "${headers.filesInfo[uploadField].filename}.${headers.filesInfo[uploadField].extension}",
                        "dateAdded": "${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}",
                        "addedBy": "${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}"
                    }
                </#if>
            </#if>
        </#list>
    }
}

templates.name: startCreditAssessmentFromICMore_mapping
templates.content:
<#-- Code to get Street and Number from one address field -->
<#assign addressStreet = "">
<#assign addressAddition = "">
<#assign onlyAdditionLeft = false>
<#assign aDateTime = (.now?long - 3600000)?number_to_datetime>
<#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToStreetAddress?? && body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToStreetAddress?has_content>
    <#list body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToStreetAddress?split(" ") as item>
        <#if !onlyAdditionLeft>
            <#if item?? && item?has_content && item[0]?matches("\\d")>
                <#assign addressNumber = item>
                <#assign onlyAdditionLeft = true>
            <#else>
                <#if addressStreet == "">
                    <#assign addressStreet += item>
                <#else>
                    <#assign addressStreet += " " + item>
                </#if>
            </#if>
        <#else>
            <#if addressAddition == "">
                <#assign addressAddition += item>
            <#else>
                <#assign addressAddition += " " + item>
            </#if>
        </#if>
    </#list>
</#if>
<#-- Use Billing name or account name-->
<#assign companyName = "">
<#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1?? && body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1?has_content>
    <#assign companyName = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1>
<#else>
    <#assign companyName = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_AccountName>
</#if>
<#-- Determin new_required_credit_line -->
<#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0?? && body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0?has_content>
    <#assign new_required_credit_line = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3?number - body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0?number>
<#else>
    <#assign new_required_credit_line = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3>
</#if>
{
    "secureData": {
        "tenantId" : "${body.initial.tenantId}",
        "user" : {
            "identity" : {
                "authenticatedUser" : "${body.initial.variables.DatabaseActionResult.gasUsername.gasUsername}",
                "groups" : [
                    {
                        <#--- We are setting the salesGroup with a lessor id of the  person who started the assessment as the process starter group -->
                        "groupID" : "${body.salesGroup.groupID}",
                        "lessorID" : "${body.salesGroup.lessorID}",
                        "userRole" : "${body.salesGroup.userRole}"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "profile" : {
                "firstName" : "${body.initial.variables.USER_FirstName}",
                "lastName" : "${body.initial.variables.USER_LastName}"
            }
        }
    },
    "answers": {
        "workflow_namespace": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial["PROCESS-NAMESPACE"]}"]
            }
        },
        "country": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.icmoreEntityInfo.country}"]
            }
        },
        "lessorID": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.icmoreEntityInfo.lessorID}"]
            }   
        },
        "groupConsolidation": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.icmoreEntityInfo.groupConsolidation}"]
            }   
        },
        "environment": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["Test"]
            }
        },
        "required_credit_line": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3}"]
            }
        },
        "new_required_credit_line": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${new_required_credit_line?replace(",", "")}"]
            }
        },
        "segment": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": ["Athlon B2B"]
            }
        },
        "sales_channel": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": ["Key Accounts"]
            }
        },
        "company_name": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${companyName?js_string}"]
            }
        },
        "account_name": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_AccountName?js_string}"]
            }
        },
        "process_type": {
            "data": {
                <#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomPickList65 == "Initial request">
                    "answerLabel": ["Prospect"]
                <#else>
                    "answerLabel": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomPickList65}"]
                </#if>
            }
        },
        "relation_id": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText33}"]
            }
        },
        "company_identifier": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText32}"] 
            }
        },
        "vatId": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText31}"] 
            }
        },
        "ic_more_account_id": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_Id}"]
            }
        },
        "customer_number": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText33}"] 
            }
        },
        "addressStreet": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressStreet)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressNumber": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressNumber)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressAddition": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressAddition)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressCity": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToCity!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressPostalCode": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToPostalCode!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressProvinceCode": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToProvince!}"]
            }
        },
        "ICMoreOwner": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ICMoreOwner!}"]
            }
        },
        "ICMoreStartProcessDate": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomDate3?datetime.iso?long + 7200000)?number_to_datetime?string("yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss")!}"]
            }
        },
        "portalVersion": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.portalVersion!}"]
            }
        },
        "icmoreUserId": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.DatabaseActionResult.icmoreAlias!}"]
            }
        },
        "icmoreEntity": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_IndexedPick0!}"]
            }
        },
        "icmoreTeamIdentifier": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomPickList10!}"]
            }
        }
    }
}

<#setting time_zone="GMT+2">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#assign savedCreditEndDateExists = false/>
<#if body.savedAnswers?? && body.savedAnswers?has_content>
    <#assign savedAnswers = body.savedAnswers.value?eval />
    <#if savedAnswers.CreditEndDate?? && savedAnswers.CreditEndDate != "">
        <#assign savedCreditEndDateExists = true/>
    </#if>
</#if>
{
    <#if body.savedAnswers?? && body.savedAnswers?has_content>
        "manual_decision": "${savedAnswers.manual_decision}",
        "pros_reasons": "${savedAnswers.M_reasons_pros}",
        "cons_reasons": "${savedAnswers.M_reasons_cons}",
        "argumentation": "${savedAnswers.M_Argumentation?json_string}",
        "reviewer": "${savedAnswers.reviewer}",
    </#if>
    <#if body.AssignedAssessCreditManualReviewerTo??>
        <#if body.AssignedAssessCreditManualReviewerTo.value == body.AssignedTo.value>
        "reviewer": "",
        <#else>
        "reviewer": "${body.AssignedAssessCreditManualReviewerTo.value}",
        </#if>
    </#if>
    <#if body.reason_of_rejection??>
        "rejected_by": "${body.AssignedAssessCreditManualReviewerToName.value?json_string}",
        "reason_of_rejection": "${body.reason_of_rejection.value?json_string}",
    </#if>
    <#if body.A_DecisionCode??>
        "A_DecisionCode": "${body.A_DecisionCode.value?json_string}",
    </#if>
    <#if savedCreditEndDateExists>
        "credit_end_date": "${body.savedAnswers.value?eval.CreditEndDate}",
    <#else>
        "credit_end_date": "${headers.defaultCreditEndDate}",
    </#if>
    <#if body.opinionNumber??>
        "second_opinion": "true",
    </#if>
    <#if body.GroupConsolidationRequired??>
        "groupconsolidationrequired": "${body.GroupConsolidationRequired.value}"
    </#if>
}

templates.name: retrieveBIinfo_error
templates.content:
{   "errorOccured": "true",
    "status": "true",
    "bpmnError": {
        <#if body?? && body.description?? && body.description?is_hash && body.description.title?? && body.description.title == "No results were found">
            "bpmnErrorCode": "NoBIResultsError",
         <#elseif body?? && body.description?? && body.description?is_hash && body.description.title?? && body.description.title == "Multiple rows returned">
             "bpmnErrorCode": "MultipleRecordsError",
        <#else>
            "bpmnErrorCode": "RetrieveBIError",
        </#if>
        <#if body?? && body.description?? && body.description?is_hash && body.description.detail??>
            "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail?json_string}"
        <#elseif body.description?? && body.description?is_string>
            "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description?json_string}"
        <#else>
            "bpmnErrorMessage": "Error occured retrieving BI info. Please check integrator."
        </#if>
    }
}

templates.name: secondOpinionArgumentation
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>

<#-- Determining the seconf opinion sequence number --> 
<#if body.processVariables.opinionNumber??>
    <#assign opinionNumber = body.processVariables.opinionNumber.value?number + 1>
<#else>
    <#assign opinionNumber = 1>
</#if>

{
    "messageName" : "StartSecondOpinionProcess",
    "tenantId" : "${body.secureData.tenantId}",
    "processVariables" : {
        <@printCamundaVariablesForProcessStart camundaVariables=body.processVariables />
        <@printDocumentsVariables documentsVariables=body.documentsVariables />
        "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
            "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\",\"label\":\"Second opinion (${opinionNumber?string})\"}",
            "type": "json"
        }
    }
}

templates.name: retrieveBIOrganizationDetails_setVariables
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#if body?is_hash && body.errorOccured??>
    <@printObjectToJson source=body />
<#else>
    <#if body?? && body?is_hash && body.description?? && body.description.title??>
        <#if body.description.title == "No results were found">
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "NoBIResultsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#elseif body.description.title == "More than one record was found">
           {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "MultipleRecordsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#else>
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "RetrieveBIError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }										  
          }
        </#if>
    <#elseif body?is_sequence>
            {
                "status": "true",
                "processVariables": {
                    "liableCompanyId": "${body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.liablerelationcompanyid!}",
                    "liableCompanyName": "${body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.liablerelationcompanyname?js_string!}",
                    "creditStatusCode": "${body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.creditstatuscode!}",
                    "creditStatusDescription": "${body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.creditstatusdescription!}",
                <#if body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.liablerelation == body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.customerid>
                    "CompanyLiable":"true"
                <#else>
                    "liableRelation": "${body[0].GCOrganizationFunction.liablerelation}",
                    "CompanyLiable":"false"
                </#if>
                }
            }
    </#if>
</#if>

templates.name: storeFilesToDMS_piper
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#assign timestamp = (aDateTime?long / 1000)?round?c>
<#-- The documentRestrictionCode can have two values '70 - All users' and '71 - all users except Sales' -->
<#assign documentRestrictionCode = 71>
{
    "pipes": [
        {
            "type" : "transform",
            "name" : "dummy",
            "script" : "uploadedFiles = [:]; initialBody = body; requestIds = [:]"
        },
        <#list body.fileNames as fileName>
            {
                "type" : "action",
                "name" : "storeFileToDMS",
                "script" : "body = [\"documentRestrictionCode\":\"${documentRestrictionCode}\",\"variables\": initialBody, \"fileName\": \"${fileName?url('UTF-8')}\", \"fileData\": initialBody.downloadedFiles[${fileName?index}]]; headers.SAMLArt = initialBody.SAMLArt; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error';  headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
            },
            {
                "type" : "transform",
                "name" : "dummy",
                "script" : "uploadedFiles[\"DOCUMENT_${timestamp}\"] = [\"fileName\": \"${fileName}\", \"addedBy\": \"Automatic credit assessment\", \"status\": \"In Progress\", \"linkToFile\": initialBody.fileNameUrlMapping[\"${fileName}\"], \"fileSize\": initialBody.fileSizes[\"${fileName}\"], \"documentRestrictionCode\":\"${documentRestrictionCode}\", \"applicationId\": initialBody.ApplicationId]; requestId = body.requestId; requestError = body.requestError;"
            },
            {
                "type" : "action",
                "name" : "setVariableToProcess",
                "script": "headers.processInstanceId = initialBody.mainProcessInstanceId; headers.variableName = 'DOCUMENT_${timestamp}'; body.variableValue = uploadedFiles[\"DOCUMENT_${timestamp}\"]; body.variableType = 'Json'; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
            },
            {
                "type" : "action",
                "name" : "setMultipleVariablesToProcess",
                "script": "headers.processInstanceId = initialBody.processInstanceId; body.variablesToSet = [requestId: requestId, requestError: requestError]; body.types = [requestId: 'string', requestError: 'string'];"
            },
            {
                "type" : "action",
                "name" : "startDocumentUploadStatusCheckProcess_piper",
                "script" : "body.variables = initialBody; body.documentInfo = uploadedFiles[\"DOCUMENT_${timestamp}\"]; body.requestId = requestId; body.requestError = requestError; body.variableName = 'DOCUMENT_${timestamp}'; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
            },
        </#list>
        {
            "type" : "transform",
            "name" : "storeFilesToDMS_setVariables",
            "script" : "body.uploadedFiles = uploadedFiles;  headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error';  headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
        }
    ]
}

templates.name: reviewManualCreditAssessment_piper
createTaskICMore
templates.content:
<#ftl strip_whitespace=false />
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>

<#-- Set the reminder date: reminder date is today + 7 days (Note that 86400000 is the amount of milliseconds per day) -->
<#assign reminderDate = (aDateTime?long + 7 * 86400000)?number_to_datetime?iso_utc>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:wsse="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/07/secext" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:act="urn:crmondemand/ws/ecbs/activity/" xmlns:data="urn:/crmondemand/xml/Activity/Data">
   <soapenv:Header>
    	<wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1">
    		<wsse:UsernameToken>
                <wsse:Username>${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMoreUsername}</wsse:Username>
                <wsse:Password Type="wsse:PasswordText">${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMorePassword}</wsse:Password>
            </wsse:UsernameToken>
    	</wsse:Security>
    </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <act:ActivityInsert_Input>
         <data:ListOfActivity lastpage="?" recordcount="?">
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <data:Activity operation="?">
                <data:DueDate>${aDateTime?date?iso_utc}</data:DueDate>
                <data:TaskReminder>${reminderDate}</data:TaskReminder>
                <#if (getTaskDescription(body)?length > 16341)>
		            <data:Description>${getTaskDescription(body)[0..16340]}</data:Description>
		        <#else>
		            <data:Description>${getTaskDescription(body)}</data:Description>
		        </#if>
		        <#if (getTaskSubject(body)?length > 150)>
		            <data:Subject>${getTaskSubject(body)[0..149]}</data:Subject>
		        <#else>
		            <data:Subject>${getTaskSubject(body)}</data:Subject>
		        </#if>
                <data:Activity>Task</data:Activity>
                <data:Status>Assigned</data:Status>
                <data:Priority>1-High</data:Priority>
                <data:Type>Credit Check</data:Type>
                <#list body.variables?keys as variableName>
                    <#if variableName?starts_with("SET_")>
                        <#assign tagName = variableName?split("_")[1]>
                        <data:${tagName}>${body.variables[variableName]}</data:${tagName}>
                    </#if>
                </#list>
            </data:Activity>
         </data:ListOfActivity>
      </act:ActivityInsert_Input>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

templates.name: retrieveBIinfo_setVariables
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#if body?is_hash && body.errorOccured??>
    <@printObjectToJson source=body />
<#else>
    <#if body?? && body?is_hash && body.description?? && body.description.title??>
        <#if body.description.title == "No results were found">
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "NoBIResultsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#elseif body.description.title == "More than one record was found">
           {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "MultipleRecordsError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }
          }
        <#else>
          {
            "status": "true",
            "bpmnError": {
              "bpmnErrorCode": "RetrieveBIError",
              "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail}"
            }										  
          }
        </#if>
    <#elseif body?is_sequence>
        {
            "status": "true",
            "processVariables": {
                "ArrearsAmountMAX": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.arrearsamountmax!}",
                "ArrearsAmountSUM": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.arrearsamountsum!}",
                "BIInfoRetrievedTime": "${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}",
                "BorrowerType": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.borrowertype!}",
                "CompanyId": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.companyid!}",
                "CustomerActivationDate": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.customeractivationdate!}",
                "CustomerActiveMonthsLast12Months": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.customeractivemonthslast12months!}",
                "CustomerGroupId": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.customergroupid!}",
                "CustomerID": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.customerid!}",
                "DaysInArrearsQty": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.daysinarrearsqty!}",
                "DaysToPayAverageLast6Months": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.daystopayaveragelast6months!}",
                "DaysToPayAverageLast12Months": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.daystopayaveragelast12months!}",
                "DefaultFlag": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.defaultflag!}",
                "LegalEntityExternalIdentifier": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.legalentityexternalidentifier!}",
                "ManagementCode00": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_00!}",
                "ManagementCode01": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_01!}",
                "ManagementCode02": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_02!}",
                "ManagementCode03": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_03!}",
                "ManagementCode04": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_04!}",
                "ManagementCode05": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_05!}",
                "ManagementCode06": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_06!}",
                "ManagementCode07": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_07!}",
                "ManagementCode08": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_08!}",
                "ManagementCode09": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_09!}",
                "ManagementCode10": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_10!}",
                "ManagementCode11": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_11!}",
                "ManagementCode12": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.managementcode_12!}",
                "NoAgreementsCurrentPeriod": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.noagreementscurrentperiod!}",
                "NoAgreementsEarlierPeriods": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.noagreementsearlierperiods!}",
                "NoTerminatedContracts": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.noterminatedcontracts!}",
                "PaymentProblemFlag": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.paymentproblemflag!}",
                "RemainingDuration": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.remainingduration!}",
                "TotalExposure": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.totalexposure!}",
                "WrittenOffDate": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.writtenoffdate!}",
                "WriteOffFlag": "${body[0].ApplicationRequest.writeoffflag!}"
            }
        }
    </#if>
</#if>

templates.name: assessCreditManually
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#if body.answers.reviewer?? && body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]?length gt 0> 
<#assign reviewer = body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]>
<#else>
  <#assign reviewer = "">
</#if>
<#assign assigneeFirstName = "">
<#assign assigneeLastName = "">
<#list body.usersOfGroup as user>
   <#if reviewer == user.id>
       <#assign assigneeFirstName = user.firstName>
       <#assign assigneeLastName = user.lastName>
   </#if>
</#list>


{
    "variables" : {
        "action": {
            "value": "${body.answers.action_options.data.answer[0]}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "AssignedAssessCreditManualTo": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.authenticatedUser}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "AssignedAssessCreditManualToName": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "AssignedAssessCreditManualToGroup": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "AssignedAssessCreditManualToGroupName": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "moreInfoProvided": {
            "value": "false",
            "type": "Boolean"
        }
        <#if !body.answers.request_information??>
            <#assign manual_decision = '' />
            <#assign M_reasons_pros = ''/>
            <#assign M_reasons_cons = ''/>
            <#assign M_Argumentation = ''/>
            <#assign CreditEndDate = ''/>
            <#assign reviewer = '' />
            <#if body.answers.manual_decision??>
                <#assign manual_decision = body.answers.manual_decision.data.answer[0] />
            </#if>
            <#if body.answers.pros_reasons??>
                <#assign M_reasons_pros = body.answers.pros_reasons.data.answer?join(',') />
            </#if>
            <#if body.answers.cons_reasons??>
                <#assign M_reasons_cons = body.answers.cons_reasons.data.answer?join(',') />
            </#if>
            <#if body.answers.argumentation??>
                <#assign M_Argumentation = body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0] />
            </#if>
            <#if body.answers.credit_end_date??>
                <#assign CreditEndDate = body.answers.credit_end_date.data.answer[0] />
            </#if>
            <#if body.answers.reviewer??>
                <#assign reviewer = body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0] />
            </#if>
            <#assign savedAnswers = {
                "manual_decision": "${manual_decision}",
                "M_reasons_pros": "${M_reasons_pros}",
                "M_reasons_cons": "${M_reasons_cons}",
                "M_Argumentation": "${M_Argumentation}",
                "CreditEndDate": "${CreditEndDate}",
                "reviewer": "${reviewer}"
            } />
            ,
            "savedAnswers": {
                "value": "<@printObjectToJsonString source=savedAnswers />",
    		    "type": "Json"
            }
        </#if>

        <#if body.answers.argumentation??>
        ,
        "M_Argumentation": {
            "value": "${body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0]}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        ,
        
            <#if body.taskVariables.opinionNumber??>
                "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                    "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\", \"label\":\"Second opinion (${body.taskVariables.opinionNumber.value?json_string})\",\"label\":\"Second opinion (${body.taskVariables.opinionNumber.value?json_string})\"}",
                    "type": "json"
                }
            <#else>
                "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                    "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\"}",
                    "type": "json"
                }
            </#if>
        
        </#if>
        
        
       <#assign cancelledDueToCorporateThresholdExceeded = "false">
       <#assign manualDecision = "">
       <#if body.answers.manual_decision??>
           <#assign manualDecision = body.answers.manual_decision.data.answer[0]>
           <#if manualDecision == 'cancel_due_to_retail_corporate_threshold_exceeded'>
             <#assign cancelledDueToCorporateThresholdExceeded = "true">
           </#if>
        </#if>
        , 
        "cancelledDueToCorporateThresholdExceeded": {
            "value": "${cancelledDueToCorporateThresholdExceeded}",
            "type": "Boolean"
        }
        <#if manualDecision?? && 
             manualDecision?length gt 0 
             && (manualDecision != 'cancel_due_to_retail_corporate_threshold_exceeded' 
             || (body.answers.reviewer?? && body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]?length gt 0))>
            ,
            "manual_decision": {
                "value": "${manualDecision}",
                "type": "String"
            }
            ,
            "M_DecisionDescription": {
                "value": "${body.answers.manual_decision.data.answerLabel[0]}",
                "type": "String"
            }
            ,
            "M_FirstOfficerApprovedName": {
                "value": "${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}",
                "type": "String"
            }
            ,
            "M_FirstOfficerApprovedDate": {
                "value": "${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "CreditEndDate": {
                    <#-- 
                        Set credit end date if user choosed any of "Accept" decisions.
                    -->
                    <#if body.answers.credit_end_date??>


                    <#assign creditEndDate = body.answers.credit_end_date.data.answer[0]?date("dd-MM-yyyy")?string("yyyy-MM-dd")>
                    
                    "value": "${creditEndDate}",
                    <#else>
                    "value": "",
                    </#if>
                    
                    "type": "String"
                }


            
            <#-- 
                Set decision dates only if review step is skipped. Otherwise we'll set them right on review submit.
            -->
            <#if body.answers.reviewer?? && body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]?length == 0>
                ,
                "M_DecisionDate": {
                    "value": "${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}",
                    "type": "String"
                }
                ,
                "M_DecisionDate_ISO": {
                    "value": "${aDateTime?iso_utc}",
                    "type": "String"
                }
            </#if>
        </#if>
        
        <#if body.answers.pros_reasons??>
        ,
        "M_reasons_pros": {
            "value": "${body.answers.pros_reasons.data.answer?join(',')}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        ,
        "M_DecisionReason_Pros": {
            "value": "${body.answers.pros_reasons.data.answerLabel?join(',')}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        </#if>
        
        <#if body.answers.cons_reasons??>
        ,
        "M_reasons_cons": {
            "value": "${body.answers.cons_reasons.data.answer?join(',')}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        ,
        "M_DecisionReason_Cons": {
            "value": "${body.answers.cons_reasons.data.answerLabel?join(',')}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        </#if>
        
        <#if body.answers.request_information??>
        ,
        "request_information_manual_assessment": {
            "value": "${body.answers.request_information.data.answer[0]}",
            "type": "String"
        }
        ,
            <#if body.taskVariables.opinionNumber??>
                "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                    "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.request_information.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\", \"label\":\"Second opinion (${body.taskVariables.opinionNumber.value?json_string})\",\"label\":\"Second opinion (${body.taskVariables.opinionNumber.value?json_string})\"}",
                    "type": "json"
                }
            <#else>
                "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
                    "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.request_information.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\"}",
                    "type": "json"
                }
            </#if>
        
        </#if>
        
        ,
        "reviewer": {
            "value": <#if body.answers.reviewer?? && body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]?length gt 0>"${body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]}"<#else>""</#if>,
            "type": "String"
        }
            
        <#-- 
            Check for skipping review task. If its skipped, remove all assignBy and assignTo values.
            Same is done on submit of review form, but since we skip it, we do it here.
        -->
        <#if body.answers.reviewer?? && body.answers.reviewer.data.answer[0]?length == 0>
            ,
            "AssignedBy": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByName": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByGroup": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByGroupName": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedTo": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToName": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToGroup": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToGroupName": {
                "value": "",
                "type": "String"
            }
        <#else>
            ,
            "AssignedBy": {
                "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.authenticatedUser}",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByName": {
                "value": "${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByGroup": {
                "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedByGroupName": {
                "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedTo": {
                "value": "<#if reviewer?? && reviewer?has_content>${reviewer}<#else>${body.taskVariables.processStarter.value}</#if>",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToName": {
                "value": "<#if reviewer?? && reviewer?has_content>${assigneeFirstName} ${assigneeLastName}<#else>${body.taskVariables.processStarterName.value}</#if>",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToGroup": {
                "value": "<#if body.answers.request_information?? && body.answers.request_information?has_content>${body.taskVariables.processStarterGroupName.value}<#else>${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}</#if>",
                "type": "String"
            },
            "AssignedToGroupName": {
                "value": "<#if body.answers.request_information?? && body.answers.request_information?has_content>${body.taskVariables.processStarterGroupName.value}<#else>${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}</#if>",
                "type": "String"
            }
        </#if>
    }
}

startSecondOpinion
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>


<#-- Determining the second opinion sequence number --> 
<#if body.processVariables.opinionNumber??>
    <#assign opinionNumber = body.processVariables.opinionNumber.value?number + 1>
<#else>
    <#assign opinionNumber = 1>
</#if>


{
    "messageName" : "StartSecondOpinionProcess",
    "tenantId" : "${body.secureData.tenantId}",
    "processVariables" : {
        <#list body.processVariables?keys as variableName>
            <#if body.processVariables[variableName].type == "Json" || body.processVariables[variableName].type == "String">
                "${variableName}": {
                    "type": "${body.processVariables[variableName].type}",
                    "value": "${body.processVariables[variableName].value}"
                },
            </#if>
        </#list>
        "previousOpinionProcessId": { 
            "value": "${body.answers.processinstanceid.data.answer[0]?string}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "opinionNumber": { 
            "value": "${opinionNumber?string}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        <#-- Second opinion argumentation note -->
        "note_${aDateTime?long?c}": {
            "value": "{\"text\":\"${body.answers.argumentation.data.answer[0]?json_string}\",\"author\":\"${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}\",\"datetime\":\"${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}\",\"label\":\"Second opinion (${opinionNumber?string})\"}",
            "type": "json"
        },
        "status": {
            "type": "String",
            "value": "Manual credit assessment requested"
        },
        "processStarter": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.authenticatedUser}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "processStarterName": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.profile.firstName} ${body.secureData.user.profile.lastName}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "processStarterGroup": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
            "type": "String"
        },
        "processStarterGroupName": {
            "value": "${body.secureData.user.identity.selectedGroup.groupID}",
            "type": "String"
        }
    },
    "resultEnabled" : true
}

templates.content:
<#assign country = getCountryShorthand(body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_IndexedPick0)>

<#-- Code to get Street and Number from one address field -->
<#assign addressStreet = "">
<#assign addressStreet = "">
<#assign addressAddition = "">
<#assign onlyAdditionLeft = false>

<#list body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToStreetAddress?split(" ") as item>
    <#if !onlyAdditionLeft>
        <#if item[0]?matches("\\d")>
            <#assign addressNumber = item>
            <#assign onlyAdditionLeft = true>
        <#else>
            <#if addressStreet == "">
                <#assign addressStreet += item>
            <#else>
                <#assign addressStreet += " " + item>
            </#if>
        </#if>
    <#else>
        <#if addressAddition == "">
            <#assign addressAddition += item>
        <#else>
            <#assign addressAddition += " " + item>
        </#if>
    </#if>
</#list>

<#-- Use Billing name or account name-->
<#assign companyName = "">
<#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1?? && body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1?has_content>
    <#assign companyName = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText1>
<#else>
    <#assign companyName = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_AccountName>
</#if>

<#-- Determin newRequestedCreditline -->
<#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0?? && body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0?has_content>
    <#assign newRequestedCreditLine = (body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3?number) - (body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency0)?number>
<#else>
    <#assign newRequestedCreditLine = body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3>
</#if>

{
    "secureData": {
        "tenantId" : "${body.initial.tenantId}",
        "user" : {
            "identity" : {
                "authenticatedUser" : "${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_Owner}",
                "groups" : [
                    {
                        "id" : "${body.salesGroup.id}",
                        "name" : "${body.salesGroup.name}",
                        "type" : "${body.salesGroup.type}"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "profile" : {
                "firstName" : "${body.userProfile.firstName}",
                "lastName" : "${body.userProfile.lastName}"
            }
        }
    },
    "answers": {
        "workflow_namespace": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial["PROCESS-NAMESPACE"]}"]
            }
        },
        "country": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${country}"]
            }
        },
        "environment": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["Test"]
            }
        },
        "required_credit_line": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomCurrency3}"]
            }
        },
        "newRequestedCreditLine": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${newRequestedCreditLine}"]
            }
        },
        "segment": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": ["Athlon B2B"]
            }
        },
        "sales_channel": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": ["Key Accounts"]
            }
        },
        "company_name": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${companyName}"]
            }
        },
        "account_name" {
           "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_AccountName}"]
            }
        }, 
        "process_type": {
            "data": {
                <#if body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomPickList65 == "Initial request">
                    "answerLabel": ["Prospect"]
                <#else>
                    "answerLabel": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomPickList65}"]
                </#if>
            }
        },
        "relation_id": {
            "data": {
                "answerLabel": [""]
            }
        },
        "company_identifier": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText32}"] 
            }
        },
        "vatId": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_CustomText31}"] 
            }
        },
        "ic_more_account_id": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_Id}"]
            }
        },
        "addressStreet": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressStreet)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressNumber": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressNumber)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressAddition": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${(addressAddition)!}"]
            }
        },
        "addressCity": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToCity}"]
            }
        },
        "addressPostalCode": {
            "data": {
                "answer": ["${body.initial.variables.ACCOUNT_PrimaryBillToPostalCode}"]
            }
        }
    }
}

templates.name: retrieveAutomaticCreditScoreMockedResponseError
templates.content:
<#-- 
    Hardcoded responses, could be of a 3 types: "success", "hitlist", "error". 
    Change "responseType" variable in order to change the process flow.
-->
<#assign responseType="error">

<#if body.successCDSFlow?? && body.successCDSFlow == "true">
   <#assign responseType="success">
</#if>

<#if responseType == "hitlist">
    {
      "status": "false",
      "description": {
        "error": {
          "type": "risk_suite_hitlist_failure",
          "message": "Search Query failed to identify unique customer. Please look into the details section of all possible customers",

downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_piper
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#assign timestamp = (aDateTime?long / 1000)?round?c>
{
    "pipes": [
        {
            "type": "action",
            "name": "loginToDMS",
            "script": "headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; tenantId = body.tenantId"
        },
        {
            "type": "action",
            "name": "getSAMLToken",
            "script": "headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
        },
        {
            "type": "transform",
            "name": "retrieveOriginalInput",
            "script": "SAMLArt = body.SAMLArt; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
        },
        {
            "type" : "script",
            "name" : "downloadFiles"
        },
        {
            "type" : "action",
            "name" : "storeFilesToDMS_piper",
            "script": "body.SAMLArt = SAMLArt; body.tenantId = tenantId; headers.handleSoapExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
        },
        {
            "type": "transform",
            "name": "downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_setVariables",
            "script": "body = [uploadedFiles: body]; headers.handleExceptionTemplate = 'downloadAndStoreFilesToDMS_error'"
        }
    ]
}

<#-- 
    Hardcoded responses, could be of a 3 types: "success", "hitlist", "error". 
    Change "responseType" variable in order to change the process flow.
-->
<#assign responseType="hitlist">

<#if body.successCDSFlow?? && body.successCDSFlow == "true">
   <#assign responseType="success">
</#if>

<#if responseType == "hitlist">
    {
      "status": "false",
      "description": {

templates.name: retrieveICMoreUserData_piper
transformUploadFiles
updateAccountICMore
templates.content:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:wsse="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/07/secext" 
    xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" 
    xmlns:acc="urn:crmondemand/ws/ecbs/account/" 
    xmlns:data="urn:/crmondemand/xml/Account/Data">
    <soapenv:Header>
        <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1">
            <wsse:UsernameToken>
                <wsse:Username>${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMoreUsername}</wsse:Username>
                <wsse:Password Type="wsse:PasswordText">${headers.soapConnectorProperties.icMorePassword}</wsse:Password>
            </wsse:UsernameToken>
        </wsse:Security>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <acc:AccountUpdate_Input>
            <data:ListOfAccount>
                <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
                <data:Account operation="UPDATE">
                    <data:Id>${body.variables.ICMoreAccountID}</data:Id>
                    <#list body.variables?keys as variableName>
                        <#if variableName?starts_with("UPDATE_")>
                            <#assign tagName = variableName?split("_")[1]>
                            <data:${tagName}>${body.variables[variableName]!}</data:${tagName}>
                        </#if>
                    </#list>
                </data:Account>
            </data:ListOfAccount>
        </acc:AccountUpdate_Input>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

templates.name: getNewEventFromICMore_setVariables
templates.content:
<#if body.errorOccured??>
    <@printObjectToJson source=body />
<#else>
    <#if body.IntegrationEventWS_GetEvents_Output?? && body.IntegrationEventWS_GetEvents_Output.LastEventId?? && body.IntegrationEventWS_GetEvents_Output.LastEventId?has_content>
        <#assign account = body.IntegrationEventWS_GetEvents_Output.ListOfEvent.Event.SiebelMessage.ListOfAccount.Account>
        {
            "status" : "true",
            "processVariables": {
                "gotNewEvent": true,
                <#list account?keys as accountKey>
                    <#if account[accountKey]?is_string>
                "EVENT_${accountKey}": "${account[accountKey]?json_string}",
                    </#if>
                </#list>
                "EVENT_LastEventId": "${body.IntegrationEventWS_GetEvents_Output.LastEventId}"
            }
        }
    <#else>
        {
            "status" : "true",
            "processVariables": {
                "gotNewEvent": false
            }
        }
    </#if>
</#if>

            "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.detail?json_string}"

templates.name: retrieveAutomaticCreditScore_setVariables
templates.content:
<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
<#assign aDateTime = .now>
<#if body.errorOccured??>
  <@printObjectToJson source=body />
<#else>
  <#if body.description?? && body.description.error??>
    <#if body.description.error.type == "risk_suite_hitlist_failure">
      {
        "status": "true",
        "bpmnError": {
          "bpmnErrorCode": "HitListReceivedException",
          "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.error.message}",
		<#if body.description.error.details??>
          "possibleCustomers": <@printObjectToJson source=body.description.error.details/>
     </#if>
        },
        "CreditPlatformResponseJSON": <@printObjectToJson source=body />													  
      }
    <#else>
      {
        "status": "true",
        "bpmnError": {
          "bpmnErrorCode": "RetrieveAutomaticCreditScoreError",
          "bpmnErrorMessage": "${body.description.error.message}"
        },
        "CreditPlatformResponseJSON": <@printObjectToJson source=body />													  
      }
    </#if>
  <#else>
    {
      "status": "true",
      "processVariables": {
        "A_DecisionDescription": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.decisionResult.decisionDescription}",
        "A_DecisionCode": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.decisionResult.decisionCode[0]}",
        "A_DecisionDate": "${aDateTime?string["yyyy-MM-dd | HH:mm:ss"]}",
        "A_DecisionDate_ISO": "${aDateTime?iso_utc}",
        "A_DecisionReason": "${businessPolicyRulesHit(body.creditScore.scoringResponse.decisionResult.policyRules)}",
        "CreditScoreID": "${body.creditScore.id}",
        "CreditEndDate": <#if body.creditScore.scoringResponse.decisionResult.decisionCode[0] == "A">"${dateAddDays(aDateTime, 364)?string["yyyy-MM-dd"]}"<#else>""</#if>,
        "ScoringValue": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.pdResult.scorePoints}",
        "ScoreCardVersion": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.pdResult.scoreCardVersion}",
        "ScoringVariables": [
          <#list body.creditScore.scoringResponse.pdResult.subScores as subScore>
            {
              "ScoreCardVariable": "${subScore.characteristicId}",
              "ScoreCardVariablePoints": "${subScore.characteristicPoints}",
              "ScoreCardVariableResult": "${subScore.characteristicValue}"
            }
            <#sep>,</#sep>
          </#list>
        ],
        <#assign creditAgencyState = []/>
        <#list body.creditScore.agencyData.businessPartners[0].externDisclosure.agencies as agency>
        <#assign creditAgencyState = creditAgencyState + [{"name": "${agency.agencyName!}", "state": "${agency.bureauProductState!}"}]/>
            <#if (agency.agencyName == "GraydonNL" || agency.agencyName == "InformaES" || agency.agencyName == "CervedIT") && agency.company?? && agency.company?has_content>
            <#-- Company info variables -->
            "CompanyNameCreditAgency": "${body.creditScore.agencyData.businessPartners[0].companyDisclosure.companyName?js_string!}",
            "LocalLegalFormCode": "${agency.company.localLegalFormDescription!}",
            "LocalIndustryCodes":  [
                <#if agency.company.localIndustryCodes?? && agency.company.localIndustryCodes?has_content>
                    <#list agency.company.localIndustryCodes as localIndustryCode>
                    {
                      "Code": "${localIndustryCode.code!}",
                      "Description": "${localIndustryCode.description!}",
                      "Type": "${localIndustryCode.type!}"
                    }
                    <#sep>,</#sep>
                  </#list>
              </#if>
             ], 
            "NumberOfEmployees": "${agency.company.numberOfEmployees!}",
            "EstablishmentDate": "<#if agency.company.foundationDate?? && agency.company.foundationDate?has_content>${agency.company.foundationDate?number?number_to_date?string("yyyy-MM-dd")}</#if>",
            <#-- Balance sheet figures -->
            "TotalCurrentAssets":  "${agency.company.totalNetAssets!}",
            "ShareholdersFunds": "${agency.company.shareholdersFunds!}",
            "IntangibleAssets": "${agency.company.intangibleAssets!}",
            "FinancialFixedAssets": "${agency.company.financialFixedAssets!}",
            "WorkingCapital": "${agency.company.workingCapital!}",
            "TotalNetAssets": "",
            <#-- Ratio's -->
            "LiquidityRatio": "${agency.company.liquidityRatio!}",
            "CurrentRatio": "${agency.company.currentRatio!}",
            "SolvencyRatio": "${agency.company.solvencyPercentage!}",
            <#-- Profit and Loss statement -->
            "EBIT" : "${agency.company.ebit!}",
            "NetTurnover": "${agency.company.netTurnover!}",
            "SalesTurnover": "${agency.company.salesTurnover!}",
            "NetResult": "${agency.company.netResult!}",
            <#-- Score class and Probability of default -->
            "ScoreClass": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.pdResult.scoreClass!}",
            "MasterPD": "${body.creditScore.scoringResponse.pdResult.masterPD!}",
            "AccountingPeriod": "${agency.company.accountingPeriod!}",
            </#if>
        </#list>
        "CompanyAddresses":  [
            <#if body.creditScore.agencyData.businessPartners[0].addresses?? && body.creditScore.agencyData.businessPartners[0].addresses?has_content>
                <#list  body.creditScore.agencyData.businessPartners[0].addresses as address>
                    {
                      "Street": "${address.street!}",
                      "Number": "${address.number!}",
                      "NumberAddition": "${address.numberAddition!}",
                      "ZipCode": "${address.zipCode!}",
                      "City": "${address.city!}",
                      "CountryCode": "${address.countryCode!}",
                      "Type": "${address.type!}"
                    }
                    <#sep>,</#sep>
                </#list>
            </#if>
        ], 
        "CreditAgencyState": <@printObjectToJson source = creditAgencyState/>,
        "filesToStore": <@printObjectToJson source=body.creditScore.documents />,
        "CreditPlatformResponseJSON": <@printObjectToJson source=body />
      }
    }
  </#if>
</#if>

retrieveICMoreAccountData_setVariables
templates.content:
<#if body.errorOccured??>
    <@printObjectToJson source=body /> 
<#elseif !body.errorOccured?? && !body.accountData?? && !body.AccountQueryPage_Output.ListOfAccount.Account??>
{
 "status": "true",
 "errorOccured": "true",
 "bpmnError": {
      "bpmnErrorCode": "ICMoreCallFailedError",
       "bpmnErrorMessage": "Account not found"
    }
}
<#else>
    <#assign account = body.accountData>
    <#assign user = body.userData>
    
    {
        "status" : "true",
        "processVariables" : {
            <#list account?keys as accountKey>
                <#if account[accountKey]?is_string>
                    "ACCOUNT_${accountKey}": "${account[accountKey]?json_string}"
                <#else>
                    "ACCOUNT_${accountKey}": ""
                </#if>
                <#sep>,</#sep>
            </#list>
            ,
            <#list user?keys as userKey>
                <#if user[userKey]?is_string>
                    "USER_${userKey}": "${user[userKey]?json_string}"
                <#else>
                    "USER_${userKey}": ""
                </#if>
                <#sep>,</#sep>
            </#list>,
            "ICMoreOwner": "${body.owner}"
        }
    }
</#if>

<#setting time_zone="Europe/Amsterdam">
